page.description: Convert a ResultSet to JSON object syntax.
page.original:
SQL ResultSet::ToJSONObjectSyntax()SyntaxC Result = < SQL::ResultSet>.rsToJSON([,N rows [,N startRow [,L flagForceObjectNamesToUppercase [,L forceToChar [,C dateTimeFormat [,C dateFormat ]]]]]])
Argument Description N rows (optional) number of rows to use N startRow (optional) first row to use L flagForceObjectNamesToUppercase (optional) Uppercase names if .T. L forceToChar (optional) If .T. (default) single-quote numeric and logical values C dateTimeFormat (optional) Format string for dateTime values, as used by the time Function, e.g. "yyyy-MM-dd" C dateFormat (optional) Format string for date values, as used by the time Function
DescriptionTakes an AlphaDAO resultset and converts the data to a JSON object. More efficient than the rsToJSON Function. LimitationsExamplesdim cn as sql::connection cn.Open("::Name::Northwind") cn.Execute("select * from orders") rs=cn.ResultSet txt=rs.ToJSONObjectSyntax(10) showvar(txt) See AlsoSQL ResultSet Object, rsToJSON Function
